https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.title_en: ARARATBANK  attracts USD 20 million from the  Dutch Development Bank
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
The Dutch Development Bank (FMO) disbursed a loan of USD 20 million to ARARATBANK OJSC for lending to SME, business projects of women entrepreneurs and to persons who are younger than 35 years of age as well as for retail lending purposes.Within the framework of one more project, loans to SME sector will be disbursed for the amount of maximum USD 1 million. Under the new loan facility agreement persons who are younger than 35 years of age will be financed within the scope of start-up business, educational and mortgage projects with a maturity of 7 years.    
Chief Investment Officer of FMO Linda Broekhuizen commented: “The cooperation with ARARATBANK has proved to contribute successfully to the ongoing development of the economy in Armenia. This new facility will especially support financing of women and young entrepreneurs and help financial inclusion in the country.”
Credit portfolio of the Bank stood at AMD 117 billion 541 million as of 31.03.2018. The share of SME loans in the total volume of the credit portfolio made over 45%. As of 31.03.2018, on-balance-sheet total assets of the Bank made AMD 211,179 million and liabilities stood at AMD 175 164 million. As of 31.03.2018, on-balance-sheet total capital of the Bank stood at AMD 36,015 million. Profit of ARARATBANK OJSC made AMD 903 million as of 31.03.2018.
FMO is the Dutch Development Bank. As a leading impact investor, FMO supports sustainable private sector growth in developing countries and emerging markets by investing in ambitious projects and entrepreneurs. FMO believes that a strong private sector leads to economic and social development, and has a more than 45-year proven track-record of empowering people to employ their skills and improve their quality of life. FMO focuses on three sectors that have high development impact: financial institutions, energy, and agribusiness, food & water. With a committed portfolio of EUR 9.2 billion spanning over 90 countries, FMO is one of the larger bilateral private sector developments banks globally.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.title_en: ARARATBANK completes the plaсement of seventeenth-issure USD denomanted bonds
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
On the 2nd of March 2018, ARARATBANK OJSC completed the IPO of the seventeenth-issue USD-denominated bonds.   
Due to high demand for the bonds, placement took 1 month all in all instead of the planned 2.5 months.    
The issuing volume made USD 8,000,000 at annual yield of 5.25% percent and a maturity of 51 months. Bonds were acquired by 260 individuals and 4 legal entities. In terms of the volume, individuals made 68.0% and legal entities made 32.0% of investors.   
Bonds will be listed at NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA Stock Exchange within 10 business days, ensuring free circulation.  
In addition, six USD-denominated and two AMD-denominated bonds — previously issued by ARARATBANK OJSC — are currently in circulation, which are quoted at NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA Stock Exchange.         
Pursuant to the Law of the Republic of Armenia "On Guarantee of Remuneration of Bank Deposits of Physical Persons” funds attracted via nominal bonds, issued by the Bank, shall be deemed guaranteed bank deposits and are guaranteed by the Deposit Guarantee Fund.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
ARARATBANK places 320,000 nominal, undocumented coupon bonds in the total volume of USD 8,000,000 at par value of USD 25, annual yield of 5.25% percent and a maturity of 51 months.  
Investing in ARARATBANK bonds, you will be provided an opportunity to use your funds efficiently.
Unlike term deposits, this mode of investing your financial funds will enable you to sell the bonds at any time in circulation and — where there are no sharp fluctuations of market interest rates — gain both the invested amount and accrued interests (yields).
Investments made by individuals in ARARATBANK bonds guided by  the terms and limits set forth for bank deposits shall be guaranteed by Deposit Guarantee Fund.
You may acquire ARARATBANK bonds in the Head Office and branches thereof between 22.01.2018 - 06.04.2018 inclusive by 16:00.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.title_en: Pleasant film viewing to MASTERCARD cardholders of ARARATBANK
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
ARARATBANK and MasterCard have launched a “Cinema Time” Campaign. Paying for purchases by MasterCard and/or Maestro cards of ARARATBANK OJSC between the 1st of March and 7th of April, 2018, you can exchange your payment receipts for movie tickets.   
Present 4 non-cash transaction receipts starting from AMD 8000 each and get a certificate for 2 movie tickets.    
You can obtain certificates from MasterCard customized pavilions installed in Dalma Garden Mall and Yerevan Mall between 10 March and 8 April, every Saturday and Sunday from 12:00 till 20:00.  
Go to this link for terms and conditions of MasterCard and Maestro cards issued by ARARATBANK. Please, be reminded that all payment cards of ARARATBANK can be ordered also ONLINE via the website of the Bank.
Combine pleasant and profitable purchases in Armenia and abroad.
* The Campaign shall not extend to the purchases made on the internet.
* The same cardholder can join the Campaign more than once.
* The number of tickets is limited.
* Present an ID card in order to receive the gift.
Have a pleasant film viewing!

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.title_en: Bonds of the National Mortgage company placed successfully
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en: We hereby inform that on the 23rd of February, 2018 ARARATBANK successfully placed 300 thousand nominal coupon bonds of the National Mortgage Company RCO CJSC with a total volume of AMD 3 billion, annual yield of 8.3%, maturity period of 3 years, of which 270,000 were placed on the platform of initial public offering of NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA OJSC and the rest of 30000 was sold to the market maker through manual transaction in compliance with the Bonds Issue Prospectus.  It is worth mentioning that the total demand from 6 members of the Stock Exchange for 270 thousand bonds made AMD 6.0 billion via the placement system of NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA OJSC . The bonds were totally placed, as a result of which the Company attracted AMD 2.712 billion. Weighted average yield of the placed bonds made 8.13%. On the same day the market maker acquired the rest of 30 thousand bonds for AMD 301.3 million.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.title_en: Baghramyan branch has been recognized the best
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
Based on the indicators of the second half of 2017, Baghramyan branch was recognized “THE BEST BRANCH” of ARARATBANK for quality, fast and secure customer service.   
The competition has taken place for the third year running. The winner-branch is selected based on the   semiannual indicators.
Baghramyan branch has been awarded with a transferable flag, Excellent Service Certificate and money prizes to all employees of the branch.          
Karen Sargsyan, the Deputy Chairman of the Executive Board, spoke on the achievements of Baghramyan branch, which was launched just two years ago. He pointed out that a customer is the most important value for ARARATBANK, and it must do its best for the customer to feel safe and comfortable in the bank. At the same time, he expressed conviction that this binding quality award would contribute to the new achievements of the branch and would be a drive for other branches.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.title_en: For the third year running global finance magazine names ARARATBANK as the best trade finance provider in Armenia
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
Already for the third year running ARARATBANK was recognized as the Best Trade Finance Provider in Armenia by the professional team of Global Finance renowned magazine.
This honorary award Best Trade Finance Provider 2018 was given to ARARATBANK, taking into account introduction of innovative digital technologies, the volume, accuracy and speed of transactions, scope of global coverage and high level of customer service.
It is due of mention that at the BAFT Global Annual Meeting, held in London on January 17, the Global Finance named the banks, which had been recognized globally the best in different nominations in 94 countries. Annual award winners were selected by Global Finance editors, economic analysts, business managers and independent experts.
To the point, within the past 8 years ARARATBANK was recognized as the best trade finance provider by two more international renowned institutions, such as German Commerzbank AG and EBRD.
Information: Global Finance Magazine has been released since 1987 and has over 50,000 subscribers in 180 countries. Global Finance’s target audience includes directors and representatives of the world’s largest private and public financial institutions. The magazine analyses important financial indicators of more than 192 countries.

ARARATBANK awards contest winners
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
As announced earlier, ARARATBANK ran a photo contest with 3 awards on Facebook, called “My Favorite Corner in Yerevan”.
According to the terms of the contest, 2 contestants, who have enjoyed the most "liked" Facebook photos, became winners, while one photo was declared by ARARATBANK as the most unique photo, the author of which was also awarded by ARARARTBANK.     
Awards to the winners were handed by ARARATBANK Deputy CEO Karen Sargsyan.
“The whole process of the contest was a stubborn struggle and we are glad that our youth in particular takes part in various events held by the bank and responds quickly to them. We are full of hope that this collaboration will continue and deepen also in the future”, stated ARARATBANK Deputy CEO Karen Sargsyan in his speech.    
We are grateful to all contestants and extend our congratulations to the winners, wishing them the triumphant spirit to guide them throughout the whole period of their lives.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.title_en: ARARATBANK attracts new credit facilities from DEG
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2018/0.content_en:
ARARATBANK and DEG‑DEUTSCHE INVESTITIONS‑ UND ENTWICKLUNGSGESELLSCHAFT MBH German investment institution entered into a loan agreement worth USD 10 000 000. 
This is the second cooperation agreement. The loan will enable the bank to increase lending to small and medium enterprises and disburse long-term funds. Out of credit facilities, 1 million will be used for funding German companies operating in Armenia.
It should be noted that DEG‑DEUTSCHE INVESTITIONS‑ UND ENTWICKLUNGSGESELLSCHAFT MBH German investment institution is a member of KfW banking group and finances investments of private companies in countries with emerging as well as transition economies.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2017/1.title_en: 3D secure secure online shopping
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2017/1.content_en:
RARATBANK introduced a 3D SECUREsecurity system to make internet-based transactions executed by its cutomers by payment cards more secure. The technology enables to additionally identify the cardholder while making payments by payment cards in the websites with the codes Verified By Visa and MasterCard SecureCode.
Each online payment shall be verified by input of a single password, which is sent via SMS to our cardholder’s mobile number. Input of the received password enables to finalize the internet transaction.  
To join the 3D SECURE system, customers may call at 010 59 23 23 (24/7 telephone number) or visit the Head Office or any of its branches and have their phone numbers registered with the Bank. The 3D SECURE service will be activated automatically for those customers who make use of the SMS service. The service is FREE at ARARATBANK.  
Attention: Highlighting the confidentiality of the bank customer data as well as the security of electronic transactions executed by the bank, please also note that the SMS sent to the customer's phone number is considered confidential information and must not be transferred to third parties, including bank employees.
Should you need additional information with regards to the service, you are free to call at 010 59 23 23 available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, or visit one of the nearest branches.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2017/1.title_en: New service at ARARATBANK – USSD banking
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2017/1.content_en:
ARARATBANK has developed a new service for its customers — USSD banking. The new service enables its customers to inquire card balance, get statements or, if necessary, block cards through mobile phones at any time.  
This facility is available for any model of mobile phone and does not require any special software to make use of the service. You are simply required to have your phone number registered in ARARATBANK database and follow the steps below:   
 
1. Dial *116# through any model of mobile phone;   
2. Customer’s plastic cards — 5 cards maximum — will appear on the screen (some numbers on the card are closed for safety reasons);
3. Thereafter, the customer can select the required card, after which respective functions will be reflected.
After you select the desired function, you will receive SMS text message at 30 Armenian drams per message.  
Please, be informed that you can add your phone number to the Bank’s database by visiting any branch of the Bank and filling out a respective application. USSD banking service is available for the subscribers of Beeline and VivaCell MTS.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2017/0.title_en: ARARATBANK to implement guaranteed placement of  FINCA UCO second tranche bonds
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2017/0.content_en:
We hereby inform that FINCA UCO CJSC is planning to issue a second-tranche nominal, coupon AMD denominated bonds on 27 April 2017. ARARATBANK will again act as an underwriter. At that, this time also underwriting will be a guaranteed one. It should be also mentioned that on 31 December 2016, the Issue Prospectus of FINCA UCO CJSC on nominal, coupon bonds was registered by the Resolution of Chairman of Central Bank of Armenia N 1/970A from 30 December 2016, within the framework of which 160,000 nominal coupon bonds with total nominal volume of USD 4,000,000, at 7.5% annual yield, semi-annual coupon redemption, 24-month maturity had already been issued and completely placed by FINCA UCO CJSC on 22 February 2017. On 13 March 2017, USD bonds were listed and included in NASDAQ OMX Armenia secondary list of bonds (Bbond) and from the moment of listing were also admitted to trading and executing repo transactions with mentioned bonds. 
FINCA UCO CJSC AMD bonds will be placed through NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA Stock Exchange placement system through one time auction. Moreover, only NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA member companies can take part in this placement auction. The list of member companies is available on NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA official website - www.nasdaqomx.am. Non-member investors may participate in the auction (make use of the offer) through Stock members in the manner and terms set out by the latter.

Dear men,
On the occasion of the women’s month (a period running between March 1 and April 7), ARARATBANK announces a contest “THE BEST WISH” from March 1 till March 25. If you consider yourself a creative man who is able to praise female representatives and willing to make beautiful wishes, you can take part in ARARATBANK contest.   
The contest consists of 2 stages:
1.Stage 1 - Send your distinctive wish message to the bank’s Facebook page between 01 and 25 March. Each participant can send only one message. The Marketing Division of the bank will select top  wishes between 25 March and 01 April.
2.Stage 2 – Wishes will be placed on the bank’s Facebook page with online voting till 05 April inclusive.  
PRIZE The participant having had enjoyed the largest number of likes will receive a watch with the Bank’s logotype.  Requirements: 1. The wish must be no longer than two sentences. 
2. The wish must correspond to the suggested topic. 
3. The wish must not be identically taken from a work of fiction.
 Wish you success!

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2016/1.title_en: Placement of the thirteenth issue dollar bonds completed
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2016/1.content_en:
ARARATBANK OJSC completed initial public offering of dollar bonds on 28 October of this year. Subscription process actually ended on 24 October, as interest in bonds was high enough with demand having exceeded supply by 41%. As a result, issued bonds had been completely sold before the end of subscription.          
The issue volume makes USD 1 million at 6.5% annual yield and maturity of three years. Bonds were acquired by 26 individuals and 3 legal entities.  In terms of volume, 73.33% of investors constitute individuals, and 26.67% legal entities.
Bonds will be transferred to customers within one working day to the relevant customer accounts and will be listed at NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA stock exchange within 10 working days, ensuring free turnover. Market maker function of the bonds will be carried out by Renesa Investment Company.         
In addition, the previous 4 dollar bonds and 1 bond denominated in Armenian drams by ARARARTBANK are currently in circulation, which are quoted in NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA stock exchange. 
Pursuant to the Armenian law "On Guarantee of remuneration of banking deposits of physical persons", cash funds attracted via nominal bonds issued by the bank shall be deemed guaranteed bank deposit and are guaranteed by the Armenian Deposit Guarantee Fund.

The mentioned card type will enable customers to withdraw cash available on the accounts from ATMs of ARARATBANK, get salary by cards, pay utility and phone bills, make payments in various trade and service outlets, travel agencies and make use of exclusive discounts in CIVOCL (Compulsory Insurance of Vehicle Owners' Civil Liability) system for ARARATBANK cardholders. Cardholders will also be provided with a complete package of services offered by the Armenian Automobile Club. In case of breakdown of your car, the main goal of the Club is to support and find fast solutions, being beside the driver not only in Armenia, but also in Georgia and NKR.
It should be also noted that the Armenian Automobile Club is the first in Armenia to offer free-of-charge towing services, legal consulting, maintenance and support to its members any time during the day and in any place. You will have access to all of these services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2016/0.title_en: ARARATBANK OJSC completed the primary placement of bonds
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2016/0.content_en:
On July 22 of this year ARARATBANK OJSC completed the primary placement of the 12th issue AMD bonds. Subscription process was actually completed still on July 20, because interest in bonds was great indeed with the demand having exceeded supply by 39%. As a result, issued bonds have been completely sold out prior to the expiry of the subscription.With 13% annual yield and a two-year maturity, the issuing volume made AMD 400 million. Bonds have been acquired by 59 individuals and 5 legal entities. In terms of the volume, 15.75% of investors made individuals and 84.25% - legal entities.
   Bonds will be transferred to the relevant customer accounts within one working day and will be listed at NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA stock exchange within 10 working days, thus, ensuring turnover. The function of a market maker of bonds will perform Renesa Investment Company. In addition, USD bonds of four issues by ARARATBANK OJSC are presently in circulation and are quoted at NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA stock exchange. 
    According to the Law of Republic of Armenia "On Guarantee of Compensation for the Banking Deposits of Physical Persons", funds attracted by nominal bonds issued by the bank shall be considered guaranteed bank deposits and are guaranteed by the Deposit Guarantee Fund.

Today on 17 June 2016 the annual general meeting of shareholders of ARARATBANK OJSC has been held in Mantashov Hall, Elite Plaza Business Center. Having summed up the performance indicators of the bank for 2015, the general meeting of shareholders approved the Executive Board annual statements, accounting reports and profit distribution according to the annual results.  
Despite external economic shocks and unfavorable internal macroeconomic environment, in 2015, ARARATBANK managed to carry out the tasks set before it. At the end of the reporting year the bank’s net profit stood at AMD 942 million, assets at AMD 132,0 billion, loans at 66,1 billion, liabilities at AMD 109,5 billion and deposits attracted from customers stood at AMD 59,3 billion.  
Increase of the number of customers by 6.5% and plastic cards by about 4% as compared to the previous year should be especially marked out among the indicators evidencing the growing trust and reputation of the bank. High growth indicator in terms of utility payments was also reported, totaling AMD 15,766 million. This indicator has grown by 19.4% as compared to the year-end figure of 2014.    
In 2015, the bank also reported a number of important events. 
Global Finance world-renowned magazine named ARARATBANK as the best trade finance provider in Armenia in 2015, taking into account the transaction volume of international trade finance, scope of global coverage and high level of customer service.
Within the framework of the Trade Facilitation Program (TFP), ARARATBANK OJSC was recognized by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) as the most active issuing bank in Armenia in 2014. 
Austrian Raiffeisen Bank International AG has honored ARARATBANK with STP Quality Award for ensuring high-quality SWIFT remittances. 
Already for the fourth year running, at the Best Exchange Member annual awards ceremony, held by NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA OJSC, ARARATBANK was recognized as the Best Exchange Member for operating actively on all platforms of exchange and the Best Exchange Member in Credit Resources Market already for the third year running. 
It should be also mentioned that the General Meeting of Shareholders has made a decision to issue and place 483,230 additional shares through private placement for the purpose of increasing the bank’s capital by AMD 8,5 billion.

With the awards ceremony taking place for the sixth year, ARARATBANK has been recognized as the Best Exchange Member in the Government Bonds Market already for the fifth time.       
It should be noted that in 2015 the volume of transactions with bonds at NASDAQ OMX Armenia stood at over AMD 13.7 billion, of which 70% (AMD 9.6 billion) falls on ARARATBANK.    
Due to IPO the Bank acquired bonds of about AMD 38.3 billion. The volume of transactions on the secondary market stood at AMD 81.3 billion.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2016/0.title_en: Global Finance world-renowned magazine named ARARATBANK as the best trade finance provider in Armenia
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2016/0.content_en:
As a result of professional survey, conducted by Global Finance renowned magazine, ARARATBANK was recognized as the Best Trade Finance Provider in Armenia in 2015.   
This honorary award was given, taking into account the transaction volume, scope of global coverage, high level of customer service, competitive pricing and innovative technologies applied at the bank.
It is due of mention that at the BAFT Global Annual Meeting, held in Paris on January 20, the Global Finance magazine has named the banks, which have been recognized globally the best in different nominations in 9 regions and 84 countries.  Annual award winners were selected by Global Finance editors, economic analysts, business managers and independent experts.
By the way, ARARATBANK has been recognized as the best trade finance provider by the third renowned international organization.
 Information: Global Finance Magazine has been released since 1987 and has over 50,000 subscribers in 180 countries. Global Finance’s audience includes directors and representatives of the world’s largest private and public financial institutions. The magazine analyses important financial indicators of more than 192 countries.

Today on 26 June 2015 the annual general meeting of shareholders of ARARATBANK OJSC has been held in Tigran the Great Hall, Armenia Marriott Hotel. Having summed up the performance indicators of the bank for 2014, the general meeting of shareholders approved the Executive Board annual statements, accounting reports and profit distribution. 
Continuing to maintain its positions among the leading banks of Armenia, in 2014 as well ARARATBANK succeeded in performing the key indicators, such as profit, ROE and ROA indicators, set out under the Strategy Plan. At the end of 2014 the bank’s total liabilities stood at AMD 116,693.8 million. This figure has increased by 10.5 % as compared to the figure of 2013. In the reporting period total capital stood at AMD 21,669,4 million. This figure has increased by 10.4 % as compared to the figure of 2013. Number of customers increased by 13.4%, amounting to 207,595. It should be pointed out that in 2014 ROE stood at 14.1% and ROA at 2.3%. As at the end of the last year the bank’s profit stood at AMD 2,843 million.
In 2014  the bank also reported a number of important events. Already for the second year running, at NASDAQ OMX ARMENIA awards ceremony ARARATBANK was recognized winner in three nominations at a time, such as the Best Exchange Member in Government Bonds Market, the Best Exchange Member in Credit Resources Market and the Best Exchange Member for operating actively on all platforms of exchange. Attaching great importance to the customer appreciation, in 2014 ARARATBANK OJSC conducted NPS survey twice and got 76% positive response from customers. 
In addition, within the framework of the Trade Facilitation Program (TFP), ARARATBANK OJSC was recognized by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) as the most active issuing bank in Armenia in 2014.

On the 20th of July, 2015 ARARATBANK OJSC implemented the coupon payment of bonds of the fifth and seventh   issue. The amount of bond yield was paid on the 20th of July according to the list (registry) of registered owners of bonds by crediting the settlement accounts of the owners of bonds.

https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2015/0.title_en: Already for the fourth time ARARATBANK has been recognized as the most active issuing bank of Armenia
https://www.araratbank.am/en/news/2015/0.content_en:
14.05.2015, Yerevan:  Within the framework of the International Trade Facilitation Program (TFP) ARARATBANK OJSC was recognized by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) as the most active issuing bank of Armenia in 2014.
The award was handed to the delegation of ARARATBANK OJSC, headed by the BoD Chairman Barsegh Beglaryan at the Trade Facilitation Conference, held within the framework of EBRD Annual General Meeting in Tbilisi. It should be noted that ARARATBANK has been honored with TFP Award for the fourth year running.
Senior Banker at EBRD Kamola Makhmudova pointed out: “The bank has been actively participating in all EBRD programs. It has big achievements in the implementation of staff qualification-related programs and such achievement is conditioned by the latter”.  
Due to the cooperation launched with EBRD still in 2007, out of trade facilitation tools the bank offers documentary letters of credit and guarantees both for import and export purposes, the effective annual interest rate of which is up to 4%, depending on the terms of the transaction.     
Implementing TFP jointly with the European Bank of Reconstruction and Development, in 2010 ARARATBANK introduced one more tool – Revolving credit agreement (RCA), aimed at financing import transactions in the form of giving prepayment. In this case the annual interest rate, depending on the terms of transaction, is up to 7%.
Note that in 2014 ARARATBANK executed documentary transactions of about USD 47 million, which increased by 52% vs. the figure of the previous year.
